channel.title: CVE Feed for shime -- find-exec
channel.description: The latest CVEs for shime -- find-exec

item.title: CVE-2023-40582|2023-08-30T17:39:20.849Z -- shime -- find-exec
item.description: find-exec is a utility to discover available shell commands. Versions prior to 1.0.3 did not properly escape user input and are vulnerable to Command Injection via an attacker controlled parameter. As a result, attackers may run malicious shell commands in the context of the running process. This issue has been addressed in version 1.0.3. users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgrade should ensure that all input passed to find-exec comes from a trusted source.
